This action searches for records across multiple Salesforce objects using natural language search (SOSL).

Backend Configuration

No specific backend configuration required. This action searches across all accessible objects.

Parameters (AI will provide)

  • searchQuery (String): The natural language search query (required)
  • sObjectTypes (Array): Optional list of object API names to limit search scope

Example: Search for "John Smith" across Contacts, Leads, and Accounts
